pipeline.forgetmenot.name: Forget-Me-Not Shaders
config.forgetmenot.desc.rtao: Performs an expensive raytrace to determine high quality ambient lighting, darkening corners.
config.forgetmenot.desc.emission: The brightness of emissive objects. Increases the brightness of bloom.
config.forgetmenot.desc.handheld_light: Handheld light handled by the shader. Only works for the player.
config.forgetmenot.desc.taa: Uses data across different frames to smartly remove most aliasing from the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.enable_bloom: Allows bright colors to bleed onto other colors. Mild performance impact.
